purpose: Maps concrete UI/marketing/docs microcopy slots to canonical modules and render policies so brand-specific LLMs fill copy without contradicting shared platform facts.

truth_layers.SHARED: Canonical product facts. Copy may be rephrased only if strictness is guided; must not contradict.
truth_layers.HYBRID: Canonical facts are shared, but framing/tone/order can vary per brand.
truth_layers.PER_BRAND: Brand wrapper content; may vary freely within brand voice.

strictness_levels.locked: Must use the canonical template or step order; only brand tone polish allowed where explicitly permitted.
strictness_levels.guided: May rewrite for tone and clarity; must include required facts/tokens; cannot introduce new claims.
strictness_levels.free: Brand may write freely; must not contradict SHARED modules and invariants.

hard_invariants: Do not rename or alter the technical token `_acme-challenge`.
Do not claim that OAuth DNS setup exists unless the `dns_oauth_setup` entitlement is enabled and the provider is supported.
Do not claim traffic proxying, CDN, or WAF features (platform is certificate/DCV service, not a reverse proxy).
Do not promise specific CA issuance times; use non-committal phrasing (e.g., 'typically within minutes') only if supported elsewhere.

dynamic_tokens.name: cname_host
dynamic_tokens.description: CNAME host that the user must create for delegation.

dynamic_tokens.name: cname_target
dynamic_tokens.description: CNAME target value provided by the platform.

dynamic_tokens.name: brand_domain
dynamic_tokens.description: Current hostname/domain used to access the platform.

dynamic_tokens.name: plan_name
dynamic_tokens.description: Displayed plan name (may be overridden per brand presentation layer).

render_modes.canonical: Use the module's canonical facts; may paraphrase unless strictness=locked.
render_modes.canonical_steps_locked: Use the module's workflow_steps exactly in order; may simplify wording but must preserve 1–4 structure.
render_modes.brand_angle: Select facts from the module but frame according to brand angle hints and persona.
render_modes.tooltip_brand_angle: Short, supportive microcopy; brand tone allowed; no new facts.
render_modes.canonical_entitlements: Render pricing/feature gating from entitlements matrix; brand may only change plan labels and taglines (if allowed).
render_modes.microcopy_brand_angle: Very short UI microcopy; brand tone allowed; must not drift into new claims.

required_includes: Conveys automated SSL for custom domains
Avoids contradicting delegated DCV mechanism
implementation_notes: Primary promise should map to delegated DCV + automation. Security angle is allowed depending on brand priorities.

required_includes: Mentions one-time CNAME delegation (can be simplified but must be accurate)
Zero-touch renewals thereafter
forbidden: requires repeated TXT changes every renewal
implementation_notes: You may explain DNS-01/ACME briefly, but do not overwhelm non-technical brands.
